item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Rotherham: An 11-year-old girl who previously reported she was sexually abused was found in a der...
item.description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Rotherham: An 11-year-old girl who previously reported she was sexually abused was found in a derelict house with another girl and a group of adult males. She was arrested for drunken disorderly, and none of the males were arrested. Police officers dismissed a case where a 12-year-old girl was having sex with five Asian males as quote "100% consensual in every incident". Fathers have tracked down their daughters and tried to remove them from the houses where they were being abused only to find themselves arrested when police arrived to the scene. Home Affairs Committee 09 Sep 2014. Crompton retired with a Â£2m pension in 2016.

item.title: @elonmusk: Watching Elon Musk on Charlie Rose in 2009 is surreal. Back then: â€¢ Tesla delivering ~1,000 Roadster...
item.description: Watching Elon Musk on Charlie Rose in 2009 is surreal. Back then: â€¢ Tesla delivering ~1,000 Roadsters/year â€¢ Model S just unveiled, promised for 2011 at ~$50k â€¢ SpaceX had reached orbit once, Falcon 9 about to fly, hoping to end US reliance on Russian rockets post-2010 â€¢ Splitting time evenly between Tesla & SpaceX As of February 2026: â€¢ Tesla: Pioneering groundbreaking tech like scaled dry-electrode 4680 batteries (major breakthrough cutting costs/energy/use, boosting scalability & energy density), advanced AI for Full Self-Driving (FSD nearing unsupervised autonomy), Cybercab/Robotaxi rollout accelerating, Optimus humanoid robots heading toward mass production & even Mars missions â€¢ SpaceX: 165 orbital launches in 2025 (world record!), ~15 so far in 2026; Crew Dragon standard (no Russian dependency); Starlink >9M subscribers (expected to double again) â€¢ Hot update: Focus on â€œself-growing cityâ€ on Moon (<10 years); Mars delayed a bit; IPO rumors at ~$1.5T valuation? Same visionary drive from 2009. Execution: now planetary + AI/robotics scale.
